*     GO TO LOGOUT;                                                0157 00302000

*   IF CMDB0=OFF|                   /* IF NOT READ W/O CONTROL, TEST    00554000
*                                      IF CSW STORED ON SIO          */ 00555000
*       CMDB1=OFF THEN                                             0210 00556000
         TM    CMDB0(CCWRST),B'11000000'                           0210 00557000
         BNO   @RT00210                                            0210 00558000
*     GO TO CCHTEST;                                               0211 00559000
*   IF CMDB3=ON THEN                /* IF READ/FEED COMMAND, TEST IF    00560000
*                                      CSW STORED ON SIO             */ 00561000
         TM    CMDB3(CCWRST),B'00010000'                           0212 00562000
         BO    @RT00212                                            0212 00563000
*     GO TO CCHTEST;                                               0213 00564000
*   IF CHCNTRL=ON THEN              /* IF SECOND OCCURRENCE, LOGOUT     00565000
*                                      AND ISSUE 'I/O ERR' MSG       */ 00566000
         TM    CHCNTRL(EWAPTR),B'00001000'                         0214 00567000
         BO    @RT00214                                            0214 00568000
*     GO TO LOGOUT;                                                0215 00569000
*   ELSE                                                           0216 00570000
*     ACPTUCS=ON;                   /* SET TO ACCEPT USEQ ON RETRY   */ 00571000
         OI    ACPTUCS(EWAPTR),B'00010000'                         0216 00572000
*   GO TO CCHTEST3;                 /* TO SET ERR COUNT AND RETRY    */ 00573000
         B     CCHTEST3                                            0217 00574000
*CCHTEST:                                                          0218 00575000
*   IF EWARGFG1=CSWSSIO THEN        /* IF CSW STORED ON SIO, TEST  0218 00576000
*                                      ERROR COUNT                   */ 00577000
CCHTEST  CLI   EWARGFG1(EWAPTR),X'80'                              0218 00578000
         BE    @RT00218                                            0218 00579000
*     GO TO CCHTEST2;                                              0219 00580000
*   IF CMDCODE=NOP THEN             /* IF ERROR ON NOP CMD, TEST   0220 00581000
*                                      ERROR COUNT                   */ 00582000
         CLI   CMDCODE(CCWRST),X'03'                               0220 00583000
         BE    @RT00220                                            0220 00584000
*     GO TO CCHTEST2;                                              0221 00585000
*   IF RTRYCD4=OFF THEN             /* IF RETRY CODE NOT 4, TEST   0222 00586000
*                                      RETRY CODE OF THREE           */ 00587000
         TM    RTRYCD4(EWAPTR),B'00000100'                         0222 00588000
         BZ    @RT00222                                            0222 00589000
*     GO TO CCHTEST4;                                              0223 00590000
*   IF RTRYCD1=ON|                  /* IF RETRY CODE NOT 4 ALONE,  0224 00591000
*                                      LOGOUT AND ISSUE 'I/O ERR' MSG*/ 00592000
*       RTRYCD2=ON THEN                                            0224 00593000
         TM    RTRYCD1(EWAPTR),B'00000011'                         0224 00594000
         BNZ   @RT00224                                            0224 00595000
*     GO TO LOGOUT;                                                0225 00596000
*CCHTEST2:                                                         0226 00597000
*   IF CHCNTRL=ON THEN              /* IF SECOND OCCURRENCE, LOGOUT,    00598000
*                                      AND ISSUE 'I/O ERR' MSG       */ 00599000
CCHTEST2 TM    CHCNTRL(EWAPTR),B'00001000'                         0226 00600000
         BO    @RT00226                                            0226 00601000
*     GO TO LOGOUT;                                                0227 00602000
*   ELSE                                                           0228 00603000
*CCHTEST3:                                                         0228 00604000
*     CHCNTRL=ON;                   /* SET ERROR COUNT AND RETRY     */ 00605000
CCHTEST3 OI    CHCNTRL(EWAPTR),B'00001000'                         0228 00606000
*   GEN(LRA CCWRST,0(CCWRST));                                     0229 00607000
         LRA CCWRST,0(CCWRST)                                           00608000
*   IF IORSTRT=ON THEN              /* IF RESTART FLAG SET, CHANGE TO   00609000
*                                      CCW RESTART ADDR              */ 00610000
         TM    IORSTRT(EWAPTR),B'10000000'                         0230 00611000
         BNO   @RF00230                                            0230 00612000
*     IOSRST=CCWRST;                                               0231 00613000
         ST    CCWRST,IOSRST(,IOSBPTR)                             0231 00614000
*   SVC(15);                        /* ISSUE SVC 15 TO RETRY         */ 00615000
@RF00230 SVC   15                                                  0232 00616000
*   SVC(3);                         /* ISSUE SVC 3 TO EXIT           */ 00617000
         SVC   3                                                   0233 00618000
*CCHTEST4:                                                         0234 00619000
*   IF RTRYCD=ZERO|                 /* RETRY CODE=0 OR 2, LOGOUT     */ 00620000
*       RTRYCD=TWO THEN                                            0234 00621000
CCHTEST4 TM    RTRYCD(EWAPTR),B'00000111'                          0234 00622000
         BZ    @RT00234                                            0234 00623000
         TM    RTRYCD(EWAPTR),B'00000010'                          0234 00624000
         BNO   @RF00234                                            0234 00625000
         TM    RTRYCD(EWAPTR),B'00000101'                          0234 00626000
         BZ    @RT00234                                            0234 00627000
*     GO TO LOGOUT;                                                0235 00628000
*   IF RTRYCDÂ¬=THREE THEN           /* IF RETRY CODE=1, TEST ERR CNT */ 00629000
@RF00234 TM    RTRYCD(EWAPTR),B'00000011'                          0236 00630000
         BNO   @RT00236                                            0236 00631000
         TM    RTRYCD(EWAPTR),B'00000100'                          0236 00632000
         BNZ   @RT00236                                            0236 00633000
*     GO TO CCHTEST2;                                              0237 00634000
*CCHTEST5:                                                         0238 00635000
*   IF CHCNTRL=ON THEN              /* IF SECOND OCCURRENCE, LOGOUT     00636000
*                                      AND ISSUE 'I/O ERR' MSG       */ 00637000
CCHTEST5 TM    CHCNTRL(EWAPTR),B'00001000'                         0238 00638000
         BO    @RT00238                                            0238 00639000
*     GO TO LOGOUT;                                                0239 00640000
*   ELSE                                                           0240 00641000
*     CHCNTRL=ON;                   /* SET ERROR COUNT FOR RETRY     */ 00642000
         OI    CHCNTRL(EWAPTR),B'00001000'                         0240 00643000
*   GO TO XCTLWTO;                                                 0241 00644000
         B     XCTLWTO                                             0241 00645000
*   GEN(EJECT);                                                    0242 00646000
*                                                                  0242 00647000
         EJECT                                                          00648000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00649000
*   /*                                                               */ 00650000
*   /* EQUIPMENT CHECK OR CHANNEL DATA CHECK ON READ COMMAND         */ 00651000
*   /*                                                               */ 00652000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00653000
*                                                                  0243 00654000
*READERR:                                                          0243 00655000
*   IF IOSCOD=IOSFINTC THEN         /* IF INTERCEPTED ERROR, BYPASS     00656000
*                                      COMMAND TESTS                 */ 00657000
READERR  CLI   IOSCOD(IOSBPTR),X'7E'                               0243 00658000
         BE    @RT00243                                            0243 00659000
*     GO TO NOCMDTST;                                              0244 00660000
*   IF CCWRSTÂ¬>0 THEN               /* IF INVALID CCW ADDR, LOGOUT 0245 00661000
*                                      AND ISSUE 'I/O ERR' MSG       */ 00662000
         LTR   CCWRST,CCWRST                                       0245 00663000
         BNP   @RT00245                                            0245 00664000
*     GO TO LOGOUT;                                                0246 00665000
*   IF CMDB6=ON THEN                /* IF READ CMD, TEST ERR CNT     */ 00666000
         TM    CMDB6(CCWRST),B'00000010'                           0247 00667000
         BO    @RT00247                                            0247 00668000
*     GO TO CKCOUNT;                                               0248 00669000
*NOCMDTST:                                                         0249 00670000
*   IOSCOD=IOSNRMC;                 /* RESET COMP CODE TO '7F'       */ 00671000
NOCMDTST MVI   IOSCOD(IOSBPTR),X'7F'                               0249 00672000
*CKINTREQ:                                                         0250 00673000
*   IF EWUINT=ON THEN               /* IF INTERVENTION REQUIRED, XCTL   00674000
*                                      TO WTO TO ISSUE MSG           */ 00675000
CKINTREQ TM    EWUINT(EWAPTR),B'01000000'                          0250 00676000
         BO    @RT00250                                            0250 00677000
*     GO TO XCTLWTO;                                               0251 00678000
*   ELSE                                                           0252 00679000
*     GO TO LOGOUT;                 /* TO LOGOUT AND ISSUE 'I/O ERR'    00680000
*                                      MSG                           */ 00681000
         B     LOGOUT                                              0252 00682000
*CKCOUNT:                                                          0253 00683000
*   IF RETRYCNT=FVRTRY THEN         /* IF FIVE RETRIES, LOGOUT AND 0253 00684000
*                                      ISSUE 'I/O ERR' MSG           */ 00685000
CKCOUNT  CLI   RETRYCNT(EWAPTR),X'05'                              0253 00686000
         BE    @RT00253                                            0253 00687000
*     GO TO LOGOUT;                                                0254 00688000
*   ELSE                                                           0255 00689000
*     RETRYCNT=RETRYCNT+1;          /* INCREMENT RETRY COUNTER       */ 00690000
         LA    @14,1                                               0255 00691000
         SR    @10,@10                                             0255 00692000
         IC    @10,RETRYCNT(,EWAPTR)                               0255 00693000
         AR    @14,@10                                             0255 00694000
         STC   @14,RETRYCNT(,EWAPTR)                               0255 00695000
*   GO TO XCTLWTO;                                                 0256 00696000
         B     XCTLWTO                                             0256 00697000
*   GEN(EJECT);                                                    0257 00698000
*                                                                  0257 00699000
         EJECT                                                          00700000
*/*IEC2540: CHART                                                    */ 00701000
*/* HEADER                                                         0258 00702000
*/*                                      IGE0001C - 2540/2501/2520 E    00703000
*/*RROR RECOVERY PROCEDURE                             PAGE #1       */ 00704000
*/* E IEC2540A                                                       */ 00705000
*/* P SET IOSEX AND IOSERR FLAGS                                     */ 00706000
*/* D (NO,,YES,ERRWTO) MIXED CHAINING CHAN PGM                       */ 00707000
*/* P CALCULATE CCW RESTART ADDRESS                                  */ 00708000
*/* D (YES,,NO,CNTRLCK) CHAN PGM CMD CHAINED                         */ 00709000
*/*%LAB1: D (NO,,YES,SETENTRY) FIRST ENTRY                           */ 00710000
*/* D (NO,,YES,CNTRLCK) ERROR ON SAME CCW                            */ 00711000
*/*SETENTRY: P CLEAR ERR COUNTS, SET ENTRY FLAG                      */ 00712000
*/* P SET RESTART FLAG IN EWA                                        */ 00713000
*/*CNTRLCK: D (NO,,YES,CHANERR) CHAN/INTF CNTRL CK                   */ 00714000
*/* D (NO,,YES,TSTUCK2) 2501 OR 2520                                 */ 00715000
*/* D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT:RRT) CHAN CHAINING CHECK                       */ 00716000
*/* D (YES,,NO,TSTUCK) CHAN DATA CHECK                               */ 00717000
*/* P INDICATE CHAN DATA CK IN STATUP                                */ 00718000
*/*TSTUCK: D (YES,,NO,CHANDCK) UNIT CHECK STATUS                     */ 00719000
*/* P 'OR' SENSE BYTE INTO STATUP                                    */ 00720000
*/* D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) 'SHOULD NOT OCCUR' SENSE                      */ 00721000
*/* D (NO,,YES,READERR) EQUIPMENT CHECK                              */ 00722000
*/*TSTSNS: D (YES,,NO,TSTSTAT:RLT) UNIT CHECK STATUS                 */ 00723000
*/* S CVTXITP:INTERPRET SENSE BYTE                                   */ 00724000
*/* D (INTR,INTREQ,BUSO,BUSOUT,DTCK,DATACK,CREJ,ERRWTO,USEQ,       0258 00725000
*/*UCMDSEQ,EOT,LOGOUT) TEST SENSE BYTE                               */ 00726000
*/*TSTUCK2: S CVTXITP:INTERPRET SENSE BYTE                           */ 00727000
*/* D (IERR,LOGOUT,EQCK,READERR,IERR,LOGOUT,INTR,INTREQ,BUSO,      0258 00728000
*/*BUSOUT,DTCK,DATACK,OVRN,OVERRUN,CREJ,ERRWTO,EOT,LOGOUT)         0258 00729000
*/*TEST SENSE BYTE                                                   */ 00730000
*/*INTREQ: D (YES,,NO,CKINTCPT) UNUSUAL CMD SEQ                      */ 00731000
*/* P (,XCTLWTO) CLEAR IOSERR FLAG                                   */ 00732000
*/*CKINTCPT: D (YES,,NO,XCTLWTO) INTERCEPTED ERROR                   */ 00733000
*/* P CLEAR RESTART FLAG IN EWA                                      */ 00734000
*/* P (,XCTLWTO) SET NORMAL COMPLETION CODE                          */ 00735000
*/*BUSOUT: D (YES,,NO,BUSCNT) 2501                                   */ 00736000
*/* D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) CHAN END OCCUR                                */ 00737000
*/*BUSCNT: D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) SECOND OCCURRENCE                      */ 00738000
*/* P SET BUSOUT ERROR COUNT TO 1                                    */ 00739000
*/* D (YES,,NO,%LAB2) RESTART FLAG ON                                */ 00740000
*/* P STORE RESTART ADDR IN IOSRST                                   */ 00741000
*/*%LAB2: R SVC 15 TO RETRY                                          */ 00742000
*/*DATACK: D (YES,,NO,LOGOUT) VALID CCW ADDR                         */ 00743000
*/* D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) BINARY MODE                                   */ 00744000
*/* D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) RETRY COUNT = 5                               */ 00745000
*/* P (,XCTLWTO) INCREMENT RETRY COUNT                               */ 00746000
*/*OVERRUN: D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) SECOND OCCURRENCE                     */ 00747000
*/* P (,XCTLWTO) SET OVERRUN ERROR COUNT TO 1                        */ 00748000
*/*UCMDSEQ: D (YES,,NO,ERRWTO) USEQ AFTER CHAN ERROR                 */ 00749000
*/* P CLEAR CSW STATUS IN IOSB                                       */ 00750000
*/*ERCORR: P CLEAR IOSEX AND IOSERR FLAGS                            */ 00751000
*/* P CLEAR RESTART FLAG IN EWA                                      */ 00752000
*/* R XCTL TO STAT UPDATE                                            */ 00753000
*/*TSTSTAT: D (NO,,YES,TSTSTAT2) 2501 OR 2520                        */ 00754000
*/* S CVTXITP:INTERPRET STATUS BYTES                                 */ 00755000
*/* D (PGC,PERMERR,PCK,PERMERR,UEX,PERMERR,IL,PERMERR,EOT,ERCORR)  0258 00756000
*/*TEST STATUS BYTES                                                 */ 00757000
*/*TSTSTAT2: S CVTXITP:INTERPRET STATUS BYTES                        */ 00758000
*/* D (CDCK,READERR,CCK,PERMERR,PGC,PERMERR,PCK,PERMERR,UEX,       0258 00759000
*/*PERMERR,IL,PERMERR,EOT,ERCORR) TEST STATUS BYTES                  */ 00760000
*/*PERMERR: P CLEAR IOSERR FLAG TO IND PERM ERR                      */ 00761000
*/* R SVC 15 - PERM ERR                                              */ 00762000
*/*LOGOUT: P SET IOSLOG FLAG IN IOSB                                 */ 00763000
*/*ERRWTO: P SET IOSMSG TO INDICATE I/O ERR MSG                      */ 00764000
*/*XCTLWTO: R XCTL TO WTO RTN                                        */ 00765000
*/*CHANDCK: D (YES,,NO,TSTSTAT) CHAN DATA CHECK                      */ 00766000
*/* D (NO,,YES,READERR) READ COMMAND                                 */ 00767000
*/* P (,TSTSTAT) CLEAR CSW STATUS IN IOSB                            */ 00768000
*/*CHANERR: D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) 2501 OR 2520                          */ 00769000
*/* D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) INTERCEPTED ERROR                             */ 00770000
*/* D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) ERPIB IND NO RETRY                            */ 00771000
*/* D (YES,,NO,LOGOUT) VALID CCW ADDR                                */ 00772000
*/* D (NO,,YES,%LAB6) READ W/O CONTROL                               */ 00773000
*/*CCHTEST: D (NO,,YES,CCHTEST2) CSW STORED ON SIO                   */ 00774000
*/* D (NO,,YES,CCHTEST2) NOP COMMAND                                 */ 00775000
*/* D (YES,,NO,CCHTEST4) RETRY CODE = 4                              */ 00776000
*/* D (NO,LOGOUT,YES,) RETRY CODE = 4 ONLY                           */ 00777000
*/*CCHTEST2: D (NO,CCHTEST3:RRT,YES,LOGOUT) SECOND OCCURRENCE        */ 00778000
*/*CCHTEST3: P SET ERROR COUNT TO 1                                  */ 00779000
*/* D (YES,,NO,%LAB8) RESTART FLAG SET                               */ 00780000
*/*  P STORE RESTART ADDR IN IOSRST                                  */ 00781000
*/*%LAB8: R SVC 15 TO RETRY                                          */ 00782000
*/*CCHTEST4: D (ZERO,LOGOUT,THRE,CCHTEST5,MIXD,) RETRY CODE = 3      */ 00783000
*/* D (YES,CCHTEST2,NO,LOGOUT) RETRY CODE = 1                        */ 00784000
*/*CCHTEST5: D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) ERROR COUNT = 1                      */ 00785000
*/* P (,XCTLWTO) SET ERROR COUNT TO 1                                */ 00786000
*/*%LAB6: D (NO,,YES,CCHTEST) READ/FEED CMD                          */ 00787000
*/* D (NO,,YES,LOGOUT) SECOND OCCURRENCE                             */ 00788000
*/* P (,CCHTEST3:RRT) SET FLAG TO ACCEPT USEQ ON RETRY               */ 00789000
*/*READERR: D (NO,,YES,NOCMDTST) INTERCEPTED ERROR                   */ 00790000
*/* D (YES,,NO,LOGOUT) VALID CCW ADDR                                */ 00791000
*/* D (NO,,YES,CKCOUNT) ERROR ON READ CMD                            */ 00792000
*/*NOCMDTST: P SET NORMAL COMPLETION CODE                            */ 00793000
*/*CKINTREQ: D (NO,LOGOUT,YES,XCTLWTO) INTERVENTION REQUIRED         */ 00794000
*/*CKCOUNT: D (YES,,NO,%LAB4) RETRY COUNT = 5                        */ 00795000
*/* P (,LOGOUT) CLEAR ERROR COUNTS                                   */ 00796000
*/*%LAB4: P (,XCTLWTO) INCREMENT ERROR COUNT                         */ 00797000
*/* END                                                              */ 00798000
*                                                                  0258 00799000
*   END IEC2540A                                                   0258 00800000

./  ADD  SSI=71940468,NAME=IGE0002A
         TITLE 'ERROR RECOVERY PROCEDURE FOR 2671 PAPER TAPE READER    *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IEC2671A CSECT                                                          00003000
         USING IEC2671A,CODEBASE     ADDRESSABILITY FOR CODE            00004000
         USING @DATD,DATABASE        ADDRESSABILITY FOR DATA            00005000
*   CODEBASE=RF;                                                   0003 00006000
         LR    CODEBASE,RF                                         0003 00007000
*   GOTO START;                                                    0004 00008000
         B     START                                               0004 00009000
*   GEN(DC    C'IGE0002A 02/02/77');/*                       @ZA11096*/ 00010000
*                                                                  0005 00011000
         DC    C'IGE0002A 02/02/77'                                     00012000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00013000
*   /*                                                               */ 00014000
*   /* REGISTERS & POINTERS                                          */ 00015000
*   /*                                                               */ 00016000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00017000
*                                                                  0006 00018000
*   DCL                                                            0006 00019000
*     R0 PTR REG(0),                /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00020000
*     R1 PTR REG(1) RSTD,           /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00021000
*     R2 PTR REG(2),                /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00022000
*     R3 PTR REG(3),                /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00023000
*     EWAPTR PTR REG(6) RSTD,       /* POINTER TO ERP WORK AREA      */ 00024000
*     IOSBPTR PTR REG(7) RSTD,      /* POINTER TO IOSB               */ 00025000
*     DATABASE PTR REG(8) RSTD,     /* BASE REGISTER FOR AUTOMATIC 0006 00026000
*                                      DATA (@DATD DSECT)            */ 00027000
*     R9 PTR REG(9),                /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00028000
*     CODEBASE PTR REG(10) RSTD,    /* BASE REGISTER FOR CODE        */ 00029000
*     RB PTR REG(11),               /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00030000
*     RC PTR REG(12),               /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00031000
*     RD PTR REG(13),               /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00032000
*     RE PTR REG(14),               /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00033000
*     RF PTR REG(15),               /* EXTERNAL LINKAGE              */ 00034000
*     CVTPTRXX PTR(31) LOCATION(16),/* POINTER TO CVT                */ 00035000
*     CVTPTR PTR(31),               /* LOCAL POINTER TO CVT          */ 00036000
*     CCWPTR PTR(31);               /* POINTER TO CURRENT CCW        */ 00037000
*                                                                  0006 00038000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00039000
*   /*                                                               */ 00040000
*   /* CSW STATUS BITS                                               */ 00041000
*   /*                                                               */ 00042000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00043000
*                                                                  0007 00044000
*   DCL                                                            0007 00045000
*     1 * DEF(IOSTATUS) BIT(16),                                   0007 00046000
*      2 CSWATN BIT(1),             /* ATTENTION                     */ 00047000
*      2 CSWSMD BIT(1),             /* STATUS MODIFIER               */ 00048000
*      2 CSWCUE BIT(1),             /* CONTROL UNIT END              */ 00049000
*      2 CSWBSY BIT(1),             /* BUSY                          */ 00050000
*      2 CSWCHE BIT(1),             /* CHANNEL END                   */ 00051000
*      2 CSWDVE BIT(1),             /* DEVICE END                    */ 00052000
*      2 CSWUCK BIT(1),             /* UNIT CHECK                    */ 00053000
*      2 CSWUEX BIT(1),             /* UNIT EXCEPTION                */ 00054000
*      2 CSWPCI BIT(1),             /* PROGRAM CONTROLED INTERRUPT   */ 00055000
*      2 CSWIL BIT(1),              /* INCORRECT LENGTH              */ 00056000
*      2 CSWPC BIT(1),              /* PROGRAM CHECK                 */ 00057000
*      2 CSWPCK BIT(1),             /* PROTECTION CHECK              */ 00058000
*      2 CSWCDK BIT(1),             /* CHANNEL DATA CHECK            */ 00059000
*      2 CSWCTK BIT(1),             /* CHANNEL CONTROL CHECK         */ 00060000
*      2 CSWICK BIT(1),             /* INTERFACE CONTROL CHECK       */ 00061000
*      2 CSWCCK BIT(1);             /* CHAINING CHECK                */ 00062000
*                                                                  0007 00063000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00064000
*   /*                                                               */ 00065000
*   /* FIELDS UNIQUE TO THIS ERP                                     */ 00066000
*   /*                                                               */ 00067000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00068000
*                                                                  0008 00069000
*   DCL                                                            0008 00070000
*     1 * CHAR(4) DEF(EWACNTR1),    /*                       @ZA11096*/ 00071000
*      2 * CHAR(1),                 /*                       @ZA11096*/ 00072000
*       3 BUSFLAG BIT(1),           /* A BUSOUT CHECK HAS BEEN     0008 00073000
*                                      DETECTED OF A PREVIOUS ENTRY  */ 00074000
*       3 ENTFLAG BIT(1),           /* ERP HAS BEEN PREVIOUSLY     0008 00075000
*                                      ENTERED FOR THIS CHANNEL    0008 00076000
*                                      PROGRAM                       */ 00077000
*       3 * BIT(6),                 /*                       @ZA11096*/ 00078000
*      2 EQCTR CHAR(1),             /* EQUIPMENT CHECK COUNTER (3  0008 00079000
*                                      RETRIES BEFORE PERMANENT    0008 00080000
*                                      ERROR)                @ZA11096*/ 00081000
*      2 * CHAR(2);                 /*                       @ZA11096*/ 00082000
*                                                                  0008 00083000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00084000
*   /*                                                               */ 00085000
*   /* CONSTANTS                                                     */ 00086000
*   /*                                                               */ 00087000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00088000
*                                                                  0009 00089000
*   DCL                                                            0009 00090000
*     ON BIT(1) CONSTANT('1'B),                                    0009 00091000
*     OFF BIT(1) CONSTANT('0'B),                                   0009 00092000
*     TIC BIT(8) CONSTANT('08'X),   /* TIC COMMAND CODE              */ 00093000
*     EREXCP FIXED(15) CONSTANT(15),/* ERROR EXCP SVC CODE           */ 00094000
*     ERPWTO FIXED(15) CONSTANT(253),/* ID OF WTO MODULE             */ 00095000
*     STATUP FIXED(15) CONSTANT(254),/* ID OF STATISTICS UPDATE    0009 00096000
*                                      MODULE                        */ 00097000
*     STATMASK BIT(8) CONSTANT('78'X),/* STATISTICS UPDATE MASK      */ 00098000
*     EXITSVC FIXED(15) CONSTANT(3);/* EXIT SVC CODE                 */ 00099000
*                                                                  0009 00100000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00101000
*   /*                                                               */ 00102000
*   /* CHANNEL COMMAND WORD                                          */ 00103000
*   /*                                                               */ 00104000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00105000
*                                                                  0010 00106000
*   DCL                                                            0010 00107000
*     1 CCWMAP BDY(DWORD) BASED(CCWPTR),                           0010 00108000
*      2 CCWCMD BIT(8),             /* COMMAND CODE                  */ 00109000
*      2 CCWADDR PTR(24),           /* DATA ADDRESS                  */ 00110000
*      2 CCWFLAG BIT(8),            /* FLAGS                         */ 00111000
*       3 CCWCD BIT(1),             /* CHAIN DATA                    */ 00112000
*       3 CCWCC BIT(1),             /* CHAIN COMMANDS                */ 00113000
*       3 CCWSLI BIT(1),            /* SUPPRESS INCORRECT LENGTH     */ 00114000
*       3 CCWSKP BIT(1),            /* SUPPRESS DATA TRANSFER        */ 00115000
*       3 CCWPCI BIT(1),            /* PROGRAM CONTROLED INTERRUPT   */ 00116000
*       3 CCWIDA BIT(1),            /* INDIRECT DATA ADDRESS         */ 00117000
*       3 * BIT(2),                 /* RESERVED                      */ 00118000
*      2 * CHAR(1),                 /* RESERVED                      */ 00119000
*      2 CCWCOUNT FIXED(16);        /* COUNT                         */ 00120000
*                                                                  0011 00121000
*/************************************************************       */ 00122000
*/*                                                                  */ 00123000
*/*  THIS STRUCTURE DESCRIBES THE CONTROL BLOCK PASSED TO THE        */ 00124000
*/*  I/O SUPERVISOR  AS A  PARAMETER OF THE SRB.  THE CONTROL        */ 00125000
*/*  BLOCK CONTAINS ALL INFORMATION NECESSARY TO INITIATE AND        */ 00126000
*/*  TERMINATE AN I/O OPERATION.  FIELDS OF THE IOSB ARE USED        */ 00127000
*/*  FOR COMMUNICATION BETWEEN THE:                                  */ 00128000
*/*                                                                  */ 00129000
*/*      1. I/O SUPERVISOR AND I/O REQUESTOR                         */ 00130000
*/*      2. I/O SUPERVISOR AND ERROR RECOVERY PROCEDURES             */ 00131000
*/*      3. COMPONENTS OF THE I/O SUPERVISOR                         */ 00132000
*/*      4. SUCCESSIVE ENTRANCES TO THE ERP'S                        */ 00133000
*/*      5. ERP AND COMMON WTO AND STATISTICS UPDATE MODULES         */ 00134000
*/*                                                                  */ 00135000
*/************************************************************       */ 00136000
*/*                                                                  */ 00137000
*/*      05/30/72   LEVEL=00                                         */ 00138000
*/*                                                                  */ 00139000
*/************************************************************       */ 00140000
*                                                                  0011 00141000
*   DCL                                                            0011 00142000
*     1 IOSB BDY(WORD) BASED(IOSBPTR),                             0011 00143000
*      2 IOSFLA CHAR(1),            /* FLAG BYTE A                   */ 00144000
*       3 IOSACHN BIT(2),           /* COMMAND & DATA CHAINING       */ 00145000
*        4 IOSDCHN BIT(1),          /* DATA CHAINING                 */ 00146000
*        4 IOSCCHN BIT(1),          /* COMMAND CHAINING              */ 00147000
*       3 IOSERR BIT(1),            /* ERROR ROUTINE IN CONTROL MUST    00148000
*                                      BE ZEROED BY DRIVER IF ERP  0011 00149000
*                                      RETURNS WITH THIS BIT ON, A 0011 00150000
*                                      RETRY IS ASSUMED. IF THE ERP     00151000
*                                      RE- TURNS WITH THIS BIT OFF,     00152000
*                                      THE ERROR IS CONSIDERED     0011 00153000
*                                      PERMANENT OR CORRECTED      0011 00154000
*                                      DEPENDING ON THE SETTING OF 0011 00155000
*                                      IOSEX.                        */ 00156000
*       3 IOSSMDA BIT(1),           /* ERP STATUS MODFR BIT . MUST BE   00157000
*                                      ZEROED BY DRIVER TAPE -     0011 00158000
*                                      REPOSITION DEVCE 1052 -     0011 00159000
*                                      IMMEDIATE OPERA- TION, CCW OP    00160000
*                                      CODE IN IOSMDB.               */ 00161000
*       3 IOSSMDB BIT(1),           /* ERP STATUS MODFR BIT B MUST BE   00162000
*                                      ZEROED BY DRIVER SET BY FETCH    00163000
*                                      IN APPEN- DAGE FOR POSTING. 0011 00164000
*                                      TAPE - CRC NEEDED DASD - PCI     00165000
*                                      FETCH STOP FLAG               */ 00166000
*       3 IOSEX BIT(1),             /* EXCEPTIONAL CONDITION. UPON 0011 00167000
*                                      RETURN FROM NORMAL OR ABNORMAL   00168000
*                                      EXIT WITH THIS BIT ON, ERP  0011 00169000
*                                      PROCES- SING IS INITIATED IF     00170000
*                                      IN- ITIAL ERROR CONDITION. IF    00171000
*                                      BIT IS OFF, IT IS AS- SUMED 0011 00172000
*                                      THAT THE EXIT COR- RECTED THE    00173000
*                                      CONDITION OR DID NOT CONSIDER    00174000
*                                      IT AN ERROR. WHEN THE ERP RE-    00175000
*                                      TURNS WITH THIS BIT ON, AND 0011 00176000
*                                      IOSERR OFF,THE ERROR IS     0011 00177000
*                                      CONSIDERED PERMANENT. WHEN THE   00178000
*                                      ERP RETRNS WITH THIS BIT OFF,    00179000
*                                      THE ERROR HAS BEEN CORRECTED. */ 00180000
*       3 IOSDOM BIT(1),            /* DOM MACRO REQUIRED    @YM06828*/ 00181000
*       3 IOSIOSB BIT(1),           /* IOSB CREATED BY IOS. MUST BE     00182000
*                                      ZEROED BY DRIVER              */ 00183000
*      2 IOSFLB CHAR(1),            /* FLAG BYTE B                   */ 00184000
*       3 IOSDIESE BIT(1),          /* SECOND ENTRY TO DIE           */ 00185000
*       3 IOSSDR BIT(1),            /* ERP DOESNT WANT OBR   @Z40MPLG*/ 00186000
*       3 IOSFLB2 BIT(1),           /* RESERVED                      */ 00187000
*       3 IOSFLB3 BIT(1),           /* RESERVED                      */ 00188000
*       3 IOSFLB4 BIT(1),           /* RESERVED                      */ 00189000
*       3 IOSMSG BIT(1),            /* MESSAGE INDICATOR 0 = INTRVNTN   00190000
*                                      REQURD MSG 1 = I/O ERROR    0011 00191000
*                                      MESSAGE                       */ 00192000
*       3 IOSBDCST BIT(1),          /* BROADCAST BIT                 */ 00193000
*       3 IOSLOG BIT(1),            /* CREATE AN OBR RECORD          */ 00194000
*      2 IOSFLC CHAR(1),            /* DEVICE DEP ERP FLAGS          */ 00195000
*       3 IOSDVMNT BIT(1),          /* DAVV ISSUED MOUNT             */ 00196000
*       3 IOSDVALT BIT(1),          /* ALTERNATE TRACK PROCES- SING     00197000
*                                      BY DAVV                       */ 00198000
*        4 IOSVERIF BIT(1),         /* UNSOLICITED DEVICE END      0011 00199000
*                                      VERIFICATION NEEDED (NON-DA)  */ 00200000
*       3 IOSCC3WE BIT(1),          /* GDP REQ'RS CC3 POST         0011 00201000
*                                      X6D@DCRR054                   */ 00202000
*       3 IOSTP BIT(1),             /* NO SPECIAL CC3              0011 00203000
*                                      HANDLINGTOBEFLGD              */ 00204000
*       3 IOSRWAIT BIT(2),          /* RESTARTABLE WAIT            0011 00205000
*                                      REASON@ZA00904                */ 00206000
*       3 IOSCTCNR BIT(1),          /* CTC-NO RETRY ALLOWED  @ZA11845*/ 00207000
*       3 IOSFLC7 BIT(1),           /* RESERVED                      */ 00208000
*      2 IOSPROC CHAR(1),           /* THIS BYTE INDICATES WHAT TYPE    00209000
*                                      OF SPECIAL PROCES- SING IS TO    00210000
*                                      BE PERFORMED BY IOS COMPONENTS   00211000
*                                      OPER- ATING ASYNCHRONOUS TO 0011 00212000
*                                      MAINLINE MUST BE ZEROED BY  0011 00213000
*                                      DRIVER DCLS ARE AT END OF IOSB*/ 00214000
*      2 IOSDVRID CHAR(1),          /* DRIVER ID VALUE VALUES AT END    00215000
*                                      OF IOSB                       */ 00216000
*      2 IOSPRLVL CHAR(1),          /* PRIORITY LEVEL AT WHICH THE 0011 00217000
*                                      ADDRESS SPACE IS TO BE      0011 00218000
*                                      SCHEDULED, 0 OR 1             */ 00219000
*      2 IOSASID CHAR(2),           /* ADDR SPACE ID OF MEMORY TO BE    00220000
*                                      SCHEDULED AT TERM OF I/O    0011 00221000
*                                      REQUEST                       */ 00222000
*      2 IOSPGAD PTR(31),           /* PGM ADDR TO BE DISPTCHD       */ 00223000
*      2 IOSPKEY BIT(8),            /* PROTECT KEY OF IOSPGAD        */ 00224000
*       3 * BIT(4),                 /* PROTECT KEY                   */ 00225000
*       3 IOSLCL BIT(1),            /* ASID SCHDLD AT LOCAL LVL      */ 00226000
*       3 IOSIDR BIT(1),            /* ASYNCHRONOUS SCHEDULING SHOULD   00227000
*                                      BE USED FOR THIS REQUEST    0011 00228000
*                                      (INDIRECT RE- CORDING FOR   0011 00229000
*                                      PAGING I/O                    */ 00230000
*       3 IOSPGDPX BIT(1),          /* THIS REQUEST HAS A BACK UP  0011 00231000
*                                      COPY (DUPLEXED PAGE)          */ 00232000
*       3 IOSPKY7 BIT(1),           /* RESERVED                      */ 00233000
*      2 IOSCOD CHAR(1),            /* I/O COMPLETION CODE USED AS 0011 00234000
*                                      TEMP SAVE FOR SYSTEM MASK BY     00235000
*                                      CHAN SCHD VALUES AT END OF  0011 00236000
*                                      IOSB                          */ 00237000
*      2 IOSOPT CHAR(1),            /* OPTIONS BYTE                  */ 00238000
*       3 IOSBYP BIT(1),            /* BYPSS IOS CHAN PGM PRFX       */ 00239000
*       3 IOSDEP BIT(1),            /* DEVICE END POST REQUSTD       */ 00240000
*       3 IOSQISCE BIT(1),          /* THIS REQUEST INITIATED BY   0011 00241000
*                                      FUNCTION WHICH HAS QUIESCED 0011 00242000
*                                      THE DEVICE                    */ 00243000
*       3 IOSPSLL BIT(1),           /* ON=LOCAL LOCK NOT WANTED FOR     00244000
*                                      POST STATUS PROCSS OFF=LOCAL     00245000
*                                      LOCK WANTED                   */ 00246000
*       3 IOSNERP BIT(1),           /* IBM ERPS NOT TO BE USED       */ 00247000
*       3 IOSTSLL BIT(1),           /* ON = LOCAL LOCK NOT WANTED BY    00248000
*                                      TERMINATION ROUTINE OFF =   0011 00249000
*                                      LOCAL LOCK WANTED BY        0011 00250000
*                                      TERMINATION ROUTINE IF IOSPSLL   00251000
*                                      ALSO ON                       */ 00252000
*       3 IOSAPR BIT(1),            /* ALT PATH RETRY ACTIVE. MUST BE   00253000
*                                      ZEROED BY DRIVER              */ 00254000
*       3 IOSRELSE BIT(1),          /* STAND-ALONE RELEASE CCW ISSUED   00255000
*                                      BY IOS                        */ 00256000
*      2 IOSOPT2 CHAR(1),           /* OPTION BYTE 2                 */ 00257000
*       3 IOSHTP BIT(1),            /* ELIGIBLE FOR SHOULDR TAP      */ 00258000
*       3 IOSOPT2X BIT(7),          /* RESERVED BITS (UNUSED)        */ 00259000
*      2 IOSUCB PTR(31),            /* UNIT CONTROL BLOCK ADDR       */ 00260000
*      2 * CHAR(8),                                                0011 00261000
*       3 IOSCC BIT(8),             /* SIO CONDITION CODE            */ 00262000
*       3 IOSCSW CHAR(7),           /* LOW ORDR 7 BYTES OF CSW       */ 00263000
*        4 IOSCSWCA PTR(24) BDY(BYTE),/* LAST COMMAND ADDRESS        */ 00264000
*        4 IOSTATUS CHAR(2),        /* CSW STATUS                    */ 00265000
*         5 IOSTSA BIT(8),          /* DEVICE STATUS                 */ 00266000
*         5 IOSTSB BIT(8),          /* CHANNEL STATUS                */ 00267000
*        4 IOSCSWRC PTR(16) BDY(BYTE),/* RISIDUAL COUNT              */ 00268000
*      2 IOSSRB PTR(31),            /* POINTER BACK TO SRB           */ 00269000
*      2 IOSUSE PTR(31),            /* USER FIELD                    */ 00270000
*      2 IOSRES4A PTR(31),          /* RESERVED                      */ 00271000
*      2 IOSAPMSK CHAR(2),          /* EXCLUSIVE PATH MASK FOR APR 0011 00272000
*                                      MUST BE ZEROED BY DRIVER      */ 00273000
*      2 IOSSNS BIT(16),            /* SENSE DATA                    */ 00274000
*/*  *********************************************************       */ 00275000
*/*    END OF COMMON SECTION AND START OF PROCESSING  DEPEN-         */ 00276000
*/*    DENT SECTIONS WHICH ARE: NORMAL I/O REQUEST, WTO, AND         */ 00277000
*/*    PCI SCHEDULING.                                               */ 00278000
*/*  *********************************************************       */ 00279000
*                                                                  0011 00280000
*      2 IOSIPIB PTR(31),           /* IOS/PURGE INTERFACE BLOCK   0011 00281000
*                                      ADDRESS MUST BE ZEROED BY   0011 00282000
*                                      DRIVER. OR CHAIN PTR FOR PCI     00283000
*                                      SRB/IOSBS                     */ 00284000
*      2 IOSPCHN PTR(31),           /* PTR TO ENDING STATUS IOSB FOR    00285000
*                                      PCI SRB/IOSBS. PTR TO FIRST 0011 00286000

*                                      IOSB.                         */ 00288000
*      2 IOSERP PTR(31),            /* ERP DYNAMIC W.A. ADDR. MUST BE   00289000
*                                      ZEROED BY DRIVER              */ 00290000
*      2 IOSPCI PTR(31),            /* PCI EXIT ADDRESS              */ 00291000
*      2 IOSNRM PTR(31),            /* NORMAL EXIT ADDRESS           */ 00292000
*      2 IOSABN PTR(31),            /* ABNORMAL EXIT ADDRESS         */ 00293000
*      2 IOSDIE PTR(31),            /* DISABLED INT. EXIT ADDR       */ 00294000
*       3 IOSDIEFG CHAR(1),         /* FLAG BYTE IN DIE PTR  @Z40WPLL*/ 00295000
*        4 IOSNOTRS BIT(1),         /* 1 = DRIVER WANTS NO   @Z40WPLL*/ 00296000
*                                                                  0011 00297000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00298000
*     /*                                                             */ 00299000
*     /* TRAS ON ENTRY TO DIE.                               @Z40WPLL*/ 00300000
*     /* 0 = NORMAL TRAS/DIE                                 @Z40WPLL*/ 00301000
*     /* LINK.                                               @Z40WPLL*/ 00302000
*     /* NOTE: THIS BIT MUST BE                              @Z40WPLL*/ 00303000
*     /* ZERO IF DIE ADDRESS                                 @Z40WPLL*/ 00304000
*     /* ZERO.                                               @Z40WPLL*/ 00305000
*     /*                                                             */ 00306000
*     /***************************************************************/ 00307000
*                                                                  0011 00308000
*      2 IOSRST PTR(31),            /* REAL ADDRESS OF REAL CHANNEL     00309000
*                                      PROGRAM                       */ 00310000
*      2 IOSVST PTR(31),            /* VIRTUAL ADDRESS OF REAL     0011 00311000
*                                      CHANNEL PROGRAM               */ 00312000
*      2 IOSDSID PTR(31),           /* DATA SET ID FOR PURGE         */ 00313000
*      2 IOSRSS1B CHAR(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 00314000
*      2 IOSAFF BIT(8),             /* CPU AFFINITY INDICATOR FOR  0011 00315000
*                                      GUARANTEED DEVCE PTH          */ 00316000
*      2 IOSPATH CHAR(2),           /* PATH SPECIFICATION FOR      0011 00317000
*                                      GUARANTEED DEVICE PATH OR   0011 00318000
*                                      SPECIFIC EXPOSURE REQUESTS    */ 00319000
*       3 IOSCHN CHAR(1),                                          0011 00320000
*        4 IOSGDP BIT(1),           /* GUARANTEED DEVICE PATH        */ 00321000
*        4 IOSEXP BIT(1),           /* SPECIFIC EXPOSURE REQST       */ 00322000
*        4 IOSPATH2 BIT(1),         /* RESERVED                      */ 00323000
*        4 IOSPATH3 BIT(1),         /* RESERVED                      */ 00324000
*        4 * BIT(4),                /* CHANNEL NUMBER                */ 00325000
*       3 IOSCUDEV CHAR(1),         /* CONTRL UNIT/DEVICE ADDR       */ 00326000
*      2 IOSFMSK CHAR(1),           /* MODE SET/FILE MASK            */ 00327000
*      2 IOSCKEY BIT(8),            /* PROT. KEY OF CHAN PGM         */ 00328000
*       3 * BIT(4),                 /* PROTECT KEY                   */ 00329000
*       3 IOSCKEY4 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 00330000
*       3 IOSCKEY5 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 00331000
*       3 IOSCKEY6 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 00332000
*       3 IOSCKEY7 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 00333000
*      2 IOSMDB CHAR(1),            /* ERP IMMED. CCW OP CODE        */ 00334000
*      2 IOSMDM CHAR(1),            /* ERP MODIFIER MASK             */ 00335000
*      2 IOSEEK CHAR(8),            /* STATIC SEEK ADDRESS           */ 00336000
*      2 IOSEEKA CHAR(8),           /* DYNAMIC SEEK ADDRESS          */ 00337000
*       3 IOSSKM PTR(8),            /* M                             */ 00338000
*       3 IOSSKBB PTR(16) BDY(BYTE),/* BB                            */ 00339000
*       3 IOSCCHH CHAR(4),          /* CCHH                          */ 00340000
*        4 IOSSKCC PTR(16) BDY(BYTE),/* CC                           */ 00341000

*         5 IOSSKH1 PTR(8),         /* H                             */ 00343000
*         5 IOSSKH2 PTR(8),         /* H                             */ 00344000
*       3 IOSSKR PTR(8),            /* R                             */ 00345000
*      2 IOSEND CHAR(0);            /* END OF IOSB                   */ 00346000
*/*    ATTENTION PROCESSING SECTION                                  */ 00347000
*                                                                  0012 00348000
*   DCL                                                            0012 00349000
*     1 IOSATTSC CHAR(64) DEF(IOSIPIB),                            0012 00350000
*      2 IOSATTSN CHAR(24),         /* ADDITIONAL SENSE IF ANY       */ 00351000
*      2 * CHAR(16),                /* ATTN RTN RSVD AREA            */ 00352000
*      2 IOSATTWA CHAR(24);         /* ATTN RTN WORK AREA            */ 00353000
*/*    WTO PROCESSING SECTION                                        */ 00354000
*                                                                  0013 00355000
*   DCL                                                            0013 00356000
*     1 IOSWTOWA CHAR(64) DEF(IOSIPIB),                            0013 00357000
*      2 IOSWTOCH CHAR(2),          /* ADDR CC=3 OCCURRED ON         */ 00358000
*      2 IOSWTOCP CHAR(1),          /* CPU CC=3 OCCURRED ON          */ 00359000
*      2 IOSWTOPT CHAR(1),          /* PATH IND. FOR CC=3            */ 00360000
*      2 IOSWRNDR CHAR(60);         /* REMAINDER OF WTO W.A.         */ 00361000
*/*    PCI SCHEDULING SECTION                                        */ 00362000
*                                                                  0014 00363000
*   DCL                                                            0014 00364000
*     1 IOSPCISC CHAR(64) DEF(IOSIPIB) BDY(WORD),                  0014 00365000
*      2 * PTR(31),                 /* SAME AS IOSIPIB. MUST NOT BE     00366000
*                                      USED                          */ 00367000
*      2 * PTR(31),                 /* SAME AS IOSPCHN. MUST NOT BE     00368000
*                                      USED                          */ 00369000
*      2 IOSPCIRS CHAR(36),         /* PCI RSVD SECTION              */ 00370000
*      2 IOSPCIWA CHAR(20);         /* PCI WORK AREA                 */ 00371000
*/* **********************************************************       */ 00372000
*/*                                                                  */ 00373000
*/*      FOLLOWING ARE THE PLS DECLARES WHICH REPLACE  THE           */ 00374000
*/*      PREVIOUSLY DEFINED %DCLARES.  THE FIELDS TO WHICH           */ 00375000
*/*      THE VALUES APPLY ARE REPRODUCED AS A COMMENT. THIS          */ 00376000
*/*      CHANGE ALLOWS A CROSS REFERENCE OF THE NAMES  USED          */ 00377000
*/*      AS FIELD VALUES.                                            */ 00378000
*/*                                                                  */ 00379000
*/* **********************************************************       */ 00380000
*                                                                  0015 00381000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00382000
*   /*                                                               */ 00383000
*   /* 2 IOSPROC CHAR(1), SEE DCL FOR DESCRIPTION                    */ 00384000
*   /*                                                               */ 00385000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00386000
*                                                                  0015 00387000
*   DCL                                                            0015 00388000
*     IOSAPCI BIT(8) CONSTANT('04'X);/* PCI                          */ 00389000
*   DCL                                                            0016 00390000
*     IOSATTN BIT(8) CONSTANT('08'X);/* ATTENTION                    */ 00391000
*   DCL                                                            0017 00392000
*     IOSAPURG BIT(8) CONSTANT('0C'X);/* PURGE                       */ 00393000
*   DCL                                                            0018 00394000

*   DCL                                                            0019 00396000
*     IOSAWTO BIT(8) CONSTANT('14'X);/* WTO                          */ 00397000
*   DCL                                                            0020 00398000

*   DCL                                                            0021 00400000
*     IOSACRH BIT(8) CONSTANT('1C'X);/* CRH                   Y30CQLG*/ 00401000

*                                                                  0022 00408000
*   DCL                                                            0022 00409000
*     IOSIOSID BIT(8) CONSTANT('00'X);/* RESERVED FOR IOS            */ 00410000
*   DCL                                                            0023 00411000
*     IOSMISID BIT(8) CONSTANT('01'X);/* MISCELLANEOUS ID FOR I/O  0023 00412000
*                                      REQUESTS THAT CANNOT BE     0023 00413000
*                                      PURGED, ASSOCIATED WITH A   0023 00414000

*   /*                                                               */ 00438000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00439000
*                                                                  0033 00440000
*/* **********************************************************       */ 00441000
*/*   COMPLETION CODES 41 - 5F ARE RESERVED FOR PERMANENT            */ 00442000
*/*   ERROR CONDITIONS. THESE CODES WILL ALWAYS BE LAST ENTRY        */ 00443000
*/*   CODES TO ABNORMAL EXITS.                                       */ 00444000
*/*   COMPLETION CODES 60 - 73 ARE RESERVED FOR IOS USE.             */ 00445000
*/*   COMPLETION CODES 74 - 7E DENOTE ABNORMAL CONDITIONS FOR        */ 00446000
*/*   WHICH CORRECTION MAY BE POSSIBLE. THESE CODES DENOTE           */ 00447000
*/*   FIRST ENTRY TO ABNORMAL EXITS.                                 */ 00448000
*/* **********************************************************       */ 00449000

*                                                                  0065 00560000
*/*                                                                  */ 00561000
*/*      COMMUNICATION VECTOR TABLE                                  */ 00562000
*/*                                                                  */ 00563000
*/*      OS/VS1 RELEASE 5, OS/VS2 RELEASE 4, 12/05/75, LEVEL=16      */ 00564000
*/*                                                                  */ 00565000
*/*  METHOD OF ACCESS                                                */ 00566000
*/*      PL/S - DCL CVTPTR PTR                                       */ 00567000
*/*      BAL  - DSECT=YES SHOULD BE SPECIFIED ON MACRO CALL EXCEPT   */ 00568000
*/*             WHEN CALLED DURING SYSGEN TO CREATE CSECT.  CVT FOR  */ 00569000
*/*             OS/VS2 IS MAPPED UNLESS SYS=AOS1 IS SPECIFIED.  THE  */ 00570000
*/*             PREFIX IS NOT MAPPED UNLESS PREFIX=YES IS SPECIFIED. */ 00571000
*/*             A USING ON CVTMAP OR DSECT NAME WILL ESTABLISH       */ 00572000
*/*             ADDRESSABILITY FOR ALL SYMBOLS EXCEPT IN THE 2       */ 00573000
*/*             EXTENSIONS.  TO ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY FOR THE     */ 00574000
*/*             OS - OS/VS COMMON EXTENSION, YOU SHOULD CODE         */ 00575000
*/*                                                                  */ 00576000
*/*             L     REG,CVTEXT1                                    */ 00577000
*/*             USING CVTXTNT1,REG                                   */ 00578000
*/*                                                                  */ 00579000
*/*             TO ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY FOR THE OS/VS1 - OS/VS2  */ 00580000
*/*             COMMON EXTENSION, YOU SHOULD CODE                    */ 00581000
*/*                                                                  */ 00582000
*/*             L     REG,CVTEXT2                                    */ 00583000
*/*             USING CVTXTNT2,REG                                   */ 00584000
*/*                                                                  */ 00585000
*/*             WHERE REG IN EITHER CASE IS ANY REGISTER OTHER       */ 00586000
*/*             THAN ZERO.                                           */ 00587000
*/*                                                                  */ 00588000
*/*             WHEN LISTING IS SUPPRESSED, YOU CAN DETERMINE WHICH  */ 00589000
*/*             DSECT A SYMBOL IS IN BY USING THE STATEMENT NUMBER   */ 00590000
*/*             IN THE DEFN COLUMN IN THE CROSS REFERENCE LISTING.   */ 00591000
*/*             FOR EXAMPLE, ANY SYMBOL DEFINED BETWEEN THE          */ 00592000
*/*             STATEMENT NUMBERS FOR CVTXTNT1 AND CVTXTNT2 IS IN    */ 00593000
*/*             THE OS - OS/VS COMMON EXTENSION.                     */ 00594000
*/*                                                                  */ 00595000
*/*  F.E.'S                                                          */ 00596000
*/*      MICROFICHE LISTING - CVT                                    */ 00597000
*/*                                                                  */ 00598000
*/*  DEVELOPERS                                                      */ 00599000
*/*      BAL LISTING  - SPECIFY LIST=YES ON MACRO CALL               */ 00600000
*/*      PL/S LISTING - SPECIFY %IHALIST='YES' BEFORE INCLUDE        */ 00601000
*/*                                                                  */ 00602000
*/*      FOR INTEGRATION, A LISTING MUST NOT BE REQUESTED UNLESS     */ 00603000
*/*      YOUR MODULE CREATES THE CSECT.                              */ 00604000
*                                                                  0065 00605000
*                                                                  0065 00606000
*/*                    CVT PROPER                                    */ 00607000
*                                                                  0065 00608000
*   DECLARE                                                        0065 00609000
*     1 CVTMAP BASED(CVTPTR) BDY(WORD),                            0065 00610000
*      2 CVT CHAR(0) BDY(WORD),     /* BEGINNING OF CVT MDC150       */ 00611000
*      2 CVTTCBP PTR(31),           /* ADDRESS OF A DOUBLE WORD, THE    00612000
*                                      FIRST CONTAINING THE NEXT-TO-    00613000
*                                      BE-DISPATCHED TCB ADDRESS. THE   00614000
*                                      SECOND CONTAINING THE LAST  0065 00615000
*                                      (CURRENT) TCB ADDRESS. BOTH 0065 00616000
*                                      WORDS ARE IDENTICAL UNLESS THE   00617000
*                                      TASK GOES INTO A WAIT STATE.     00618000
*                                      WHEN IN A WAIT STATE, THE   0065 00619000
*                                      FIRST WORD IS SET TO ZERO   0065 00620000
*                                      UNTIL THE WAITING IS OVER AND    00621000
*                                      THEN BOTH WORDS ARE ONCE AGAIN   00622000
*                                      IDENTICAL. (OS/VS1) ADDRESS OF   00623000
*                                      4-WORD LIST OF ADDRESSES - THE   00624000
*                                      NEXT TCB, THE CURRENT TCB, THE   00625000
*                                      NEXT ASCB AND THE CURRENT   0065 00626000
*                                      ASCB, IN THAT ORDER (OS/VS2)     00627000
