*       3 CVTRV461 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01840000
*       3 CVTRV462 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01841000
*       3 CVTRV463 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01842000
*       3 CVTRV464 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01843000
*       3 CVTRV465 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01844000
*      2 CVTRV466 BIT(8),           /* RESERVED                      */ 01845000
*       3 CVTRV467 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01846000
*       3 CVTRV468 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01847000
*       3 CVTRV469 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01848000
*       3 CVTRV470 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01849000
*       3 CVTRV471 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01850000
*       3 CVTRV472 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01851000
*       3 CVTRV473 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01852000
*       3 CVTRV474 BIT(1),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01853000
*      2 CVTRV475 PTR(8),           /* RESERVED                      */ 01854000
*      2 CVTRV476 PTR(8),           /* RESERVED                      */ 01855000
*      2 CVTRV477 PTR(8),           /* RESERVED                      */ 01856000
*      2 CVTRV478 PTR(8),           /* RESERVED                      */ 01857000
*      2 CVTRV479 FIXED(15),        /* RESERVED                      */ 01858000
*      2 CVTRV480 PTR(31),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01859000
*      2 CVTRV481 PTR(31),          /* RESERVED                      */ 01860000
*      2 CVTRV482 PTR(31);          /* RESERVED                      */ 01861000
*/*                       CVT PREFIX                                 */ 01862000
*                                                                  0069 01863000
*   DCL                                                            0069 01864000
*     1 CVTFIX BASED(CVTPTR-256) BDY(WORD),                        0069 01865000
*      2 * CHAR(248) BDY(WORD),     /* RESERVED                      */ 01866000
*      2 * CHAR(2) BDY(WORD),       /* RESERVED                      */ 01867000
*      2 CVTMDL CHAR(2) BDY(WORD,3),/* CPU MODEL NUMBER IN SIGNLESS     01868000
*                                      PACKED DECIMAL, I.E., A MODEL    01869000
*                                      145 WOULD BE REPRESENTED AS 0069 01870000
*                                      0145 HEX                      */ 01871000
*      2 CVTRELNO CHAR(4) BDY(WORD),/* RELEASE NUMBER (EBCDIC)       */ 01872000
*       3 CVTNUMB CHAR(2) BDY(WORD),/* RELEASE NUMBER                */ 01873000
*       3 CVTLEVL CHAR(2) BDY(WORD,3);/* LEVEL NUMBER OF THIS RELEASE*/ 01874000
*/*                    END OF CVT MACRO                              */ 01875000
*                                                                  0070 01876000
* /*                                                               0070 01877000
*        MACRO                                                     0070 01878000
*        EWAMAP                                                    0070 01879000
*WA      DSECT                                                     0070 01880000
*        SPACE 1                                                   0070 01881000
****************************************************************   0070 01882000
*                                                              *   0070 01883000
*  THIS DSECT DESCRIBES THE ERROR PROCEDURE WORK AREA COMMON   *   0070 01884000
*  SECTION WHICH IS INVOKED BY  IECDERWA  AS AN INNER MACRO.   *   0070 01885000
*  IT IS GOTTEN BY THE I/O INTERRUPT HANDLER OR POST STATUS.   *   0070 01886000
*  THE WORKAREA CONSISTS OF TWO  SECTIONS:   -   THE  COMMON   *   0070 01887000
*  SECTION WHICH CONTAINS INDICATORS,  COUNTERS,  AND  SENSE   *   0070 01888000
*  INFORMATION - AND ERP DEPENDENT SECTIONS WHICH ARE AVAIL-   *   0070 01889000
*  ABLE FOR ERP USE AS NEEDED.  THE DEPENDENT  SECTIONS  ARE   *   0070 01890000
*  INCLUDED BY IECDERWA VIA OPTIONS THROUGH THE MACRO  CALL.   *   0070 01891000
*                                                              *   0070 01892000
****************************************************************   0070 01893000
*        SPACE 1                                                   0070 01894000
*WAHDR   DS    0F                                                  0070 01895000
*WAEXT   DS    A                   ADDRESS OF WORKAREA EXTENSION   0070 01896000
*WAFLG1  DS    XL1                 FLAG BYTE 1                     0070 01897000
*WASLIS  EQU   X'80'               W.A. INVOLVED IN RECOVERY SENSE 0070 01898000
*        EQU   X'70'               RESERVED                        0070 01899000
*WASCCD  EQU   X'0C'               SIO CONDITION CODE              0070 01900000
*WASCC3  EQU   X'0C'               CONDITION CODE 3                0070 01901000
*WASCC2  EQU   X'08'               CONDITION CODE 2                0070 01902000
*WASCC1  EQU   X'04'               CONDITION CODE 1                0070 01903000
*WASCC0  EQU   X'00'               CONDITION CODE 0                0070 01904000
*WADDMSG EQU   X'02'               ERP DEPENDENT DATA TO BE        0070 01905000
*                                  INCLUDED IN I/O ERROR MESSAGE   0070 01906000
*WABDSNS EQU   X'01'               SENSE UNSUCCESSFUL              0070 01907000
*WAFLG2  DS    XL1                 FLAG BYTE 2                     0070 01908000
*WAMDR   EQU   X'80'               IF ON, MDR REQUEST              0070 01909000
*                                  IF OFF, OBR REQUEST             0070 01910000
*WAWTEMP EQU   X'40'               ON - TEMPORARY WRITE ERROR      0070 01911000
*                                  COUNTER TO BE UPDATED IF        0070 01912000
*                                  DATA CHECK CONDITION            0070 01913000
*                                  OFF - TEMPORARY READ ERROR      0070 01914000
*                                  COUNTER TO BE UPDATED           0070 01915000
*WACOVF  EQU   X'20'               COUNTER OVERFLOW INDICATOR      0070 01916000
*                                  FOR STATISTICS UPDATE           0070 01917000
*WADIR   EQU   X'10'               DIR IN PROGRESS                 0070 01918000
*        EQU   X'0F'               RESERVED                        0070 01919000
*WAFLG3  DS    XL1                 FOR DEVICE DEPENDENT ERP USAGE  0070 01920000
*WAJAM   EQU   X'80'               3800 PAPER JAM              @Y40MPLG 01921000
*WASNSCT DS    XL1                 LOOP COUNT FOR SENSE FAILURE    0070 01922000
*WASCTMX EQU   X'10'               MAX # OF SENSES TRIED           0070 01923000
*WASSTAT DS    XL2                 CSW STATUS ON SENSE OPERATION   0070 01924000
*                                  IF THIS IS A UNIT CHECK         0070 01925000
*WACNTR1 DS    XL1                 COUNTERS FOR ERP USE            0070 01926000
*WACNTR2 DS    XL1                                                 0070 01927000
*WACNTR3 DS    XL1                                                 0070 01928000
*WACNTR4 DS    XL1                                                 0070 01929000
*WASTUP  DS    XL2                 STATISTICS INFORMATION FOR      0070 01930000
*                                  USE IN STATISTICS UPDATE        0070 01931000
*WAERPIB DS    XL8                 ERPIB BUILT BY CCH FOR CHANNEL  0070 01932000
*                                  ERRORS TO INDICATE WHETHER      0070 01933000
*                                  RETRY IS TO BE ATTEMPTED        0070 01934000
*        ORG   EWAERPIB                                            0070 01935000
*        DS    XL1                 RESERVED                        0070 01936000
*WAUCB   DS    AL3                 UCB ADDRESS                     0070 01937000
*WARGFG1 DS    XL1                 FLAG BYTE                       0070 01938000
*WACSIO  EQU   X'80'               CSW STORED AFTER SIO            0070 01939000
*WACINT  EQU   X'40'               CSW STORED AFTER I/O INTERRUPT  0070 01940000
*WACTIO  EQU   X'20'               CSW STORED AFTER TEST I/O       0070 01941000
*WACHIO  EQU   X'10'               CSW STORED AFTER HALT I/O       0070 01942000
*        EQU   X'08'               RESERVED                        0070 01943000
*WACSNS  EQU   X'04'               SENSE DATA WAS STORED           0070 01944000
*WACCNT  EQU   X'02'               CSW COUNT IS VALID              0070 01945000
*WANORTY EQU   X'01'               NO RETRY INDICATOR              0070 01946000
*WARGFG2 DS    XL1                 PROBABLE SOURCE INDICATORS      0070 01947000
*WACCPU  EQU   X'80'               CPU ERROR                       0070 01948000
*WACCHA  EQU   X'40'               CHANNEL ERROR                   0070 01949000
*WACSCU  EQU   X'20'               STORAGE CONTROL UNIT ERROR      0070 01950000
*WACSTG  EQU   X'10'               STORAGE ERROR                   0070 01951000
*WACCUE  EQU   X'08'               CONTROL UNIT ERROR              0070 01952000
*        EQU   X'07'               RESERVED                        0070 01953000
*WAXCSW1 DS    XL1                 VALIDITY INDICATORS             0070 01954000
*WACITF  EQU   X'80'               INTERFACE ADDR IS VALID         0070 01955000
*        EQU   X'60'               RESERVED                        0070 01956000
*WACSQV  EQU   X'10'               SEQUENCE CODE IS VALID          0070 01957000
*WACUNS  EQU   X'08'               UNIT STATUS IS VALID            0070 01958000
*WACCMD  EQU   X'04'               COMMAND ADDRESS IS VALID        0070 01959000
*WACCHV  EQU   X'02'               CHANNEL ADDRESS IS VALID        0070 01960000
*WACDAV  EQU   X'01'               DEVICE ADDRESS IS VALID         0070 01961000
*WAXCSW2 DS    XL1                 TERMINATION & SEQUENCE CODES    0070 01962000
*WACTEC  EQU   X'C0'               TERMINATION CODE.               0070 01963000
*WATER0  EQU   X'00'               INTERFACE DISCONNECT            0070 01964000
*WATER1  EQU   X'04'               STOP, STACK, OR NORMAL TERM     0070 01965000
*WATER2  EQU   X'80'               SELECTIVE RESET                 0070 01966000
*WATER3  EQU   X'C0'               SYSTEM RESET                    0070 01967000
*        EQU   X'30'               RESERVED                        0070 01968000
*WACDIN  EQU   X'08'               I/O ERROR ALERT                 0070 01969000
*WACSEQ  EQU   X'07'               CHANNEL DEPENDENT SEQ. CODES    0070 01970000
*WASEQ0  EQU   X'00'                                               0070 01971000
*WASEQ1  EQU   X'01'                                               0070 01972000
*WASEQ2  EQU   X'02'                                               0070 01973000
*WASEQ3  EQU   X'03'                                               0070 01974000
*WASEQ4  EQU   X'04'                                               0070 01975000
*WASEQ5  EQU   X'05'                                               0070 01976000
*WASEQ6  EQU   X'06'                                               0070 01977000
*WASEQ7  EQU   X'07'                                               0070 01978000
*        ORG   EWAERPIB+L'EWAERPIB  '                              0070 01979000
*WACHA   DS    XL2                 UNIT ADDRESS ON WHICH LAST      0070 01980000
*                                   I/O WAS STARTED                0070 01981000
*        DS    XL1                 RESERVED                        0070 01982000
*WACPU   DS    XL1                 CPUID OF CPU ON WHICH I/O       0070 01983000
*                                  ERROR WAS ENCOUNTERED           0070 01984000
*WADCNT  DS    XL1                 NUMBER OF BYTES OF OBR INFO     0070 01985000
*WADDISP DS    XL3                 ADDRESS OF FIRST BYTE OF OBR    0070 01986000
*                                  DEVICE DEPENDENT INFORMATION    0070 01987000
*WAIERP  DS    XL128               AREA FOR INDIVIDUAL ERP USE     0070 01988000
*        ORG   EWAIERP                                             0070 01989000
*        SPACE 1                                                   0070 01990000
*  IOS USAGE OF ERP DEPENDENT AREA FOR READING SENSE DATA  AND     0070 01991000
*  FOR A TEMPORARY STORAGE BEFORE THE ERP IS INITIALLY ENTERED     0070 01992000
*WASNS   EQU   *                   SENSE DATA START                0070 01993000
*        DS    XL64                SENSE INFORMATION               0070 01994000
*WASCSW  DS    CL7                 SLOT TO SAVE CSW ON INTERCEPT   0070 01995000
*WAHL    EQU   32                  HEADER LENGTH                   0070 01996000
*        MEND                                                      0070 01997000
* */                                                               0070 01998000
*                                                                  0070 01999000
* /************************************************************/   0070 02000000
* /*                                                          */   0070 02001000
* /* THIS STRUCTURE DESCRIBES THE ERROR PROCEDURE  WORK AREA  */   0070 02002000
* /* COMMON SECTION WHICH IS INVOKED BY IECDERWA AS AN INNER  */   0070 02003000
* /* MACRO.  IT IS GOTTEN BY THE I/O  INTERRUPT  HANDLER  OR  */   0070 02004000
* /* POST STATUS. THE WORKAREA CONSISTS OF TWO SECTIONS: THE  */   0070 02005000
* /* COMMON SECTION WHICH CONTAINS INDICATORS, COUNTERS, AND  */   0070 02006000
* /* SENSE INFORMATION - AND  ERP DEPENDENT  SECTIONS  WHICH  */   0070 02007000
* /* ARE AVAILABLE FOR ERP USE AS NEEDED. THE DEPENDENT SEC-  */   0070 02008000
* /* TIONS ARE INCLUDED BY IECDERWA VIA OPTIONS THROUGH  THE  */   0070 02009000
* /* MACRO CALL.                                              */   0070 02010000
* /*                                                          */   0070 02011000
* /************************************************************/   0070 02012000
*                                                                  0070 02013000
*   DCL 1 EWA  BDY(DWORD) BASED(EWAPTR),                           0070 02014000
*       2  EWAHDR   PTR(31),       /* EWA HEADER              */   0070 02015000
*         3 EWAEXT  PTR(31),       /* ADDRESS OF WA EXTENTION */   0070 02016000
*       2  EWAFLAGS CHAR(4),       /* FOUR BYTES OF FLAGS     */   0070 02017000
*         3 EWAFLG1 BIT(8),        /* FLAG BYTE 1             */   0070 02018000
*          4 EWASLIS BIT(1),       /* WORK AREA INVOLVED IN   */   0070 02019000
*                                  /* RECOVERY SENSE          */   0070 02020000
*          4 *        BIT(3),      /* RESERVED                */   0070 02021000
*          4 EWASCCD  BIT(2),      /* SIO CONDITION CODE      */   0070 02022000
*           5 EWASCC3 BIT(2),      /* CONDITION CODE 3        */   0070 02023000
*            6 EWASCC2 BIT(1),     /* CONDITION CODE 2        */   0070 02024000
*            6 EWASCC1 BIT(1),     /* CONDITION CODE 1             0070 02025000
*                                     SEE END OF EWA FOR CC 0 */   0070 02026000
*          4 EWADDMSG BIT(1),      /* ERP DEPENDENT DATA TO BE     0070 02027000
*                                     INCLUDED IN I/O ERROR        0070 02028000
*                                     MESSAGE                 */   0070 02029000
*          4 EWABDSNS BIT(1),      /* SENSE UNSUCCESSFUL      */   0070 02030000
*         3 EWAFLG2 BIT(8),        /* FLAG BYTE 2             */   0070 02031000
*          4 EWAMDR BIT(1),        /* IF ON, MDR REQUEST           0070 02032000
*                                     IF OFF, OBR REQUEST     */   0070 02033000
*          4 EWAWTEMP BIT(1),      /* ON - TEMPORARY WRITE ERR     0070 02034000
*                                     COUNTER TO BE UPDATE IF      0070 02035000
*                                     DATA CHECK CONDITION         0070 02036000
*                                     OFF - TEMPORARY READ ERR     0070 02037000
*                                     COUNTER TO BE UPDATED   */   0070 02038000
*          4 EWACOVF BIT(1),       /* COUNTER OVERFLOW FOR         0070 02039000
*                                     STATISTICS UPDATE       */   0070 02040000
*          4 EWADIR  BIT(1),       /* DIR IN PROGRESS         */   0070 02041000
*          4 *     BIT(4),         /* RESERVED                */   0070 02042000
*         3 EWAFLG3 BIT(8),        /* FOR DEVICE DEPENDENT ERP     0070 02043000
*                                     USAGE                   */   0070 02044000
*          4 EWAJAM BIT(1),        /* 3800 PAPER JAM         @Y40MPLG*/ 02045000
*         3 EWASNSCT BIT(8),       /* LOOP COUNT FOR SENSE         0070 02046000
*                                     FAILURE                 */   0070 02047000
*         4 *        BIT(3),       /* RESERVED                */   0070 02048000
*         4 EWASCTMX BIT(1),       /* MAX. # OF SENSES TRIED  */   0070 02049000
*       2  EWASSTAT BIT(16),       /* CSW STATUS ON SENSE OP-      0070 02050000
*                                     ERATION IF THIS IS A         0070 02051000
*                                     UNIT CHECK.             */   0070 02052000
*       2  EWACNTRS CHAR(4),       /* COUNTERS FOR ERP USE    */   0070 02053000
*         3 EWACNTR1 PTR(8),       /* COUNTER 1               */   0070 02054000
*         3 EWACNTR2 PTR(8),       /* COUNTER 2               */   0070 02055000
*         3 EWACNTR3 PTR(8),       /* COUNTER 3               */   0070 02056000
*         3 EWACNTR4 PTR(8),       /* COUNTER 4               */   0070 02057000
*       2  EWASTUP  CHAR(2),       /* STATISTICS INFORMATION       0070 02058000
*                                     FOR UPDATING STATISTICS */   0070 02059000
*       2  EWAERPIB CHAR(8),       /* ERPIB BUILT BY CCH FOR       0070 02060000
*                                     CHANNEL ERRORS TO INDI-      0070 02061000
*                                     CATE TO ATTEMPT A RETRY */   0070 02062000
*         3 *        CHAR(1),      /* RESERVED                */   0070 02063000
*         3 EWAUCB   PTR(24)   BDY(BYTE),                          0070 02064000
*                                  /* UCB ADDRESS             */   0070 02065000
*         3 EWARGFG1 BIT(8),       /* FLAG BYTE               */   0070 02066000
*          4 EWACSIO BIT(1),       /* CSW STORED AFTER SIO    */   0070 02067000
*          4 EWACINT BIT(1),       /* CSW STORED AFTER I/O INT*/   0070 02068000
*          4 EWACTIO BIT(1),       /* CSW STORED AFTR TEST I/O*/   0070 02069000
*          4 EWACHIO BIT(1),       /* CSW STORED AFTR HALT I/O*/   0070 02070000
*          4 *       BIT(1),       /* RESERVED                */   0070 02071000
*          4 EWACSNS BIT(1),       /* SENSE DATA WAS STORED   */   0070 02072000
*          4 EWACCNT BIT(1),       /* CSW COUNT IS VALID      */   0070 02073000
*          4 EWANORTY BIT(1),      /* NO RETRY INDICATOR      */   0070 02074000
*         3 EWARGFG2 BIT(8),       /* PROBABLE SOURCE INDICTRS*/   0070 02075000
*          4 EWACCPU BIT(1),       /* CPU ERROR               */   0070 02076000
*          4 EWACCHA BIT(1),       /* CHANNEL ERROR           */   0070 02077000
*          4 EWACSCU BIT(1),       /* STORAGE CONTROL UNIT ERR*/   0070 02078000
*          4 EWACSTG BIT(1),       /* STORAGE ERROR           */   0070 02079000
*          4 EWACCUE BIT(1),       /* CONTROL UNIT ERROR      */   0070 02080000
*          4 *       BIT(3),       /* RESERVED                */   0070 02081000
*         3 EWAXCSW1 BIT(8),       /* VALIDITY INDICATORS     */   0070 02082000
*          4 EWACITF BIT(1),       /* INTERFACE ADDR IS VALID */   0070 02083000
*          4 *       BIT(2),       /* RESERVED                */   0070 02084000
*          4 EWACSQV BIT(1),       /* SEQUENCE CODE IS VALID  */   0070 02085000
*          4 EWACUNS BIT(1),       /* UNIT STATUS IS VALID    */   0070 02086000
*          4 EWACCMD BIT(1),       /* COMMAND ADDRESS IS VALID*/   0070 02087000
*          4 EWACCHV BIT(1),       /* CHANNEL ADDR IS VALID   */   0070 02088000
*          4 EWACDAV BIT(1),       /* DEVICE ADDRESS IS VALID */   0070 02089000
*         3 EWAXCSW2 BIT(8),       /* TERMINATN & SEQNCE CODES*/   0070 02090000
*          4 EWACTEC BIT(2),       /* TERMINATION CODE             0070 02091000
*                                     SEE BELOW FOR VALUES    */   0070 02092000
*          4 *       BIT(2),       /* RESERVED                */   0070 02093000
*          4 EWACDIN BIT(1),       /* I/O ERROR ALERT         */   0070 02094000
*          4 EWACSEQ BIT(3),       /* SEQUENCE CODES - SEE         0070 02095000
*                                     BELOW                   */   0070 02096000
*       2  EWACHA   CHAR(2),       /* UNIT ADDRESS ON WHICH        0070 02097000
*                                     LAST I/O WAS STARTED    */   0070 02098000
*       2  *        CHAR(1),       /* RESERVED                */   0070 02099000
*       2  EWACPU   CHAR(1),       /* CPUID OF I/O ERROR      */   0070 02100000
*       2  EWADCNT  CHAR(1),       /* # OF BYTES OF OBR INFO  */   0070 02101000
*       2  EWADDISP PTR(24),       /* ADDRESS OF OBR DEVICE        0070 02102000
*                                     DEPENDENT INFORMATION   */   0070 02103000
*       2  EWAIERP  CHAR(128)  BDY(DWORD);                         0070 02104000
*                                  /* AREA FOR INDIVIDUL ERPS */   0071 02105000
*                                                                  0071 02106000
*  DCL 1 EWADDIOS CHAR(71) DEF(EWAIERP) BDY(DWORD),                0071 02107000
*                                                                  0071 02108000
* /*  IOS USAGE OF ERP DEPENDENT AREA FOR READING SENSE DATA  */   0071 02109000
* /*  FOR TEMPORARY STORAGE BEFORE ERP IS INITIALLY ENTERED.  */   0071 02110000
*                                                                  0071 02111000
*       2  EWASNS  CHAR(64),       /* SENSE DATA START        */   0071 02112000
*       2  EWASCSW CHAR(7),        /* SLOT TO SAVE CSW ON          0071 02113000
*                                     INTERCEPT               */   0071 02114000
*       2  EWAEND  CHAR(0);        /* END OF EWA              */   0071 02115000
*   DCL EWASCC0 BIT(8) CONSTANT('00'X);  /*                        0072 02116000
*                                     CONDITION CODE 0        */   0072 02117000
*   DCL EWATER0 BIT(2) CONSTANT('00'B);  /*                        0073 02118000
*                                  INTERFACE DISCONNECT       */   0073 02119000
*   DCL EWATER1 BIT(2) CONSTANT('01'B);  /*                        0074 02120000
*                                  STOP, STACK, NORMAL TERMNTN*/   0074 02121000
*   DCL EWATER2 BIT(2) CONSTANT('10'B);  /*                        0075 02122000
*                                  SELECTIVE RESET            */   0075 02123000
*   DCL EWATER3 BIT(2) CONSTANT('11'B);  /*                        0076 02124000
*                                  SYSTEM RESET               */   0076 02125000
*   DCL EWACSEQ0 BIT(3) CONSTANT('000'B);                          0077 02126000
*   DCL EWACSEQ1 BIT(3) CONSTANT('001'B);                          0078 02127000
*   DCL EWACSEQ2 BIT(3) CONSTANT('010'B);                          0079 02128000
*   DCL EWACSEQ3 BIT(3) CONSTANT('011'B);                          0080 02129000
*   DCL EWACSEQ4 BIT(3) CONSTANT('100'B);                          0081 02130000
*   DCL EWACSEQ5 BIT(3) CONSTANT('101'B);                          0082 02131000
*   DCL EWACSEQ6 BIT(3) CONSTANT('110'B);                          0083 02132000
*   DCL EWACSEQ7 BIT(3) CONSTANT('111'B);                          0084 02133000
*/*                                                                0085 02134000
*        MACRO                                                     0085 02135000
*        EWUMAP                                                    0085 02136000
**/                                                                0085 02137000
*/********************************************************************/ 02138000
*/* EWUMAP MAPS THE DEVICE DEPENDENT SECTION OF THE ERP WORK AREA    */ 02139000
*/*        FOR UNIT RECORD DEVICES. IT IS CALLED AS AN INNER MACRO   */ 02140000
*/*        FROM IECDERWA.                                            */ 02141000
*/*        THE FOLLOWING CODES ARE USED TO INDICATE WHICH DEVICES    */ 02142000
*/*        THE FIELDS APPLY TO:                                      */ 02143000
*/*        A - 1403,1443                                             */ 02144000
*/*        B - 3211                                                  */ 02145000
*/*        C - 1442,2501,2520,2596                                   */ 02146000
*/*        D - 1402,2540                                             */ 02147000
*/*        E - 3505,3525                                             */ 02148000
*/*        F - 2671                                                  */ 02149000
*/********************************************************************/ 02150000
*/*                                                                0085 02151000
*        ORG   EWAIERP                                             0085 02152000
*WUSN0   DS    X                  1ST SENSE BYTE                   0085 02153000
*WUCREJ  EQU   X'80'              COMMAND REJECT      (ALL)        0085 02154000
*WUINT   EQU   X'40'              INTERVENTION REQD.  (ALL)        0085 02155000
*WUBUSO  EQU   X'20'              BUS OUT             (ALL)        0085 02156000
*WUEQCK  EQU   X'10'              EQUIPMENT CHECK     (ALL)        0085 02157000
*WUDTCK  EQU   X'08'              DATA CHECK          (ALL)        0085 02158000
*WUBUFP  EQU   X'04'              BUFFER PARITY       (A,B)        0085 02159000
*WUOVRN  EQU   X'04'              OVERRUN             (C)          0085 02160000
*WULDCK  EQU   X'02'              LOAD CHECK          (B)          0085 02161000
*WUUSEQ  EQU   X'02'              UNUSUAL SEQUENCE    (D)          0085 02162000
*WUABFR  EQU   X'02'              ABNORMAL FMT RESET  (E)          0085 02163000
*WUCH9   EQU   X'01'              CHANNEL 9           (A,B)        0085 02164000
*WUPEK   EQU   X'01'              PERMANENT ERROR KEY (E)          0085 02165000
*WUSN1   DS    X                  2ND SENSE BYTE                   0085 02166000
*WUCRTRY EQU   X'80'              COMMAND RETRY       (B)          0085 02167000
*WUPERM  EQU   X'80'              PERMANENT ERROR     (E)          0085 02168000
*WUPCK   EQU   X'40'              PRINT CHECK         (B)          0085 02169000
*WUARTRY EQU   X'40'              AUTOMATIC RETRY     (E)          0085 02170000
*WUPQ    EQU   X'20'              PRINT QUALITY       (B)          0085 02171000
*WUMOT   EQU   X'20'              MOTION ERROR        (E)          0085 02172000
*WULNPOS EQU   X'10'              LINE POSITION       (B)          0085 02173000
*WUIRTRY EQU   X'10'              RETRY AFTER INT.REQ.(E)          0085 02174000
*WUFORM  EQU   X'08'              FORMS CHECK         (B)          0085 02175000
*WUSUPR  EQU   X'04'              COMMAND SUPPRESS    (B)          0085 02176000

* DCL                                                              0085 02189000
*  1 EWUMAP CHAR(128)BDY(DWORD)DEF(EWAIERP),                       0085 02190000

*/*         R EXIT VIA SVC 3                                         */ 02546000
*/*INTREQ:  P (,WTOXCTL) PUT REAL RESTART ADDRESS IN IOSB            */ 02547000

*/*         P TURN ON BUSFLAG                                        */ 02549000
*/*         P PUT REAL RESTART ADDRESS IN IOSB                       */ 02550000
*/*         I ERROR EXCP SVC 15                                      */ 02551000

*/*UEXIL:   D (ON,OK,OFF,LOG$MSG) TEST ERP ENTERED FLAG              */ 02553000
